sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import PendingRequest from '../Components/PendingRequest'; import PopRequest from '../Components/PopModalRequests'; import OrgData from '../Components/PopModalOrgUnits' const Container = styled.div` >.distribute{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 2rem; } ` function Distribute() { const [distributionData, setDistributionData] = useState("") const pendingRequest = [ { "requestTitle": "Vaccine request", "requestOrigin": " From Masaka Hospital", "request": { "BSG": "30", "DMR": "490", "IPV": "70", "VAT": "900", "DBCG": "805" }, "responce": { "BSG": "", "DMR": "", "IPV": "", "VAT": "", "DBCG": "" } }, { "requestTitle": "Item request", "requestOrigin": "From Kibagabaga Hospital", "request": { "BSG": "100", "DMR": "40", "IPV": "810", "VAT": "600", "DBCG": "50" }, "responce": { "BSG": "", "DMR": "", "IPV": "", "VAT": "", "DBCG": "" } }, { "requestTitle": "Item Request", "requestOrigin": "From Masaka Hospital", "request": { "BSG": "50", "DMR": "190", "IPV": "74", "VAT": "50", "DBCG": "800" }, "responce": { "BSG": "", "DMR": "", "IPV": "", "VAT": "", "DBCG": "" } }, { "requestTitle": "Vaccine Request", "requestOrigin": "From CHU/K", "request": { "BSG": "300", "DMR": "250", "IPV": "70", "VAT": "90", "DBCG": "500" }, "responce": { "BSG": "", "DMR": "", "IPV": "", "VAT": "", "DBCG": "" } }, { "requestTitle": "Vaccine Request", "requestOrigin": "From Gahini Hospital", "request": { "BSG": "125", "DMR": "10", "IPV": "80", "VAT": "150", "DBCG": "1000" }, "responce": { "BSG": "", "DMR": "", "IPV": "", "VAT": "", "DBCG": "" } }, ] return (

Distribute Vaccine



Pending request

{pendingRequest.map(post => { return (
{/*

{post.requestTitle}

{post.requestOrigin}
*/}
{post.requestOrigin}
{/* */}
) })}
{distributionData?

{distributionData.requestOrigin}

{distributionData? Object.entries(distributionData.request).map(e=>( )):""}
Vaccine Name Quantity ordered
{e[0]} {e[1]}
:""}
) } export default Distribute
